pdb18.connection

Class OracleDBConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • pdb18.connection.OracleDBConnection

  • public class OracleDBConnection
extends Object
    The OracleDBConnection class handles the connection to the database. Main function is connecting, reconnecting and disconnecting from the database.
    Author:
    Tomas Aubrecht (xaubre02@stud.fit.vutbr.cz)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OracleDBConnection() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean connect(String user, String pass)
      Connect to the database using username and password.
      static boolean disconnect()
      Disconnect from the database.
      static Connection getConnection()
      Return the instance of the database connection.
      static void init(String[] args)
      Initialize the resources for connecting to a database.
      static void initDatabase(String scriptPath)
      Initialize database by given initialization script defined by path.
      static void initPictures()
      Load pictures of the animals and save them in the database.
      static boolean reconnect()
      Reconnect to the database using previously used credentials.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init(String[] args)
        Initialize the resources for connecting to a database.
        Parameters:
        args - arguments for the OracleDriver

      • connect

        public static boolean connect(String user,
                              String pass)
        Connect to the database using username and password.
        Parameters:
        user - database account username
        pass - database account password
        Returns:
        true if connected, else false

      • reconnect

        public static boolean reconnect()
        Reconnect to the database using previously used credentials.
        Returns:
        true if reconnected, else false

      • disconnect

        public static boolean disconnect()
        Disconnect from the database.
        Returns:
        true if disconnected, else false

      • getConnection

        public static Connection getConnection()
        Return the instance of the database connection.
        Returns:
        database connection

      • initDatabase

        public static void initDatabase(String scriptPath)
                         throws Exception
        Initialize database by given initialization script defined by path.
        Parameters:
        scriptPath - path to initialization script
        Throws:
        Exception - when something goes wrong (database error, not found file)

      • initPictures

        public static void initPictures()
                         throws SQLException,
                                IOException
        Load pictures of the animals and save them in the database.
        Throws:
        SQLException - SQL error
        IOException - I/O error
